entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Stony Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:30 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -31.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stony Rapids Airport 10:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -31.1°C
Pressure: 103.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -34.3°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
